TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrinterResolution extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the resolution supported by a printer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to get the printer resolutions that are available on the printer and to set the printing resolution for a page, respectively.
Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> property to determine whether the printer resolution type is the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> value <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>. If so, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> properties to determine the printer resolution in the horizontal and vertical directions, respectively.
For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
## Examples The following code example populates the `comboPrintResolution` combo box with the supported resolutions. The example assumes that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
[!code-cs[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.drawing.printin_3_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.drawing.printin_3_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.drawing.printin_3_1.vb)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> class.
|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>|

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the printer resolution.
Docs.exception: The value assigned is not a member of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> that contains information about the .

Docs.summary: Gets the horizontal printer resolution, in dots per inch.
Docs.value: The horizontal printer resolution, in dots per inch, if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to ; otherwise, a value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `dmPrintQuality` is a member of the `DEVMODE` (device mode) structure, which defines constants that map to printer quality settings. The X property contains the value `DMRES_HIGH` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>, `DMRES_MEDIUM` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>, `DMRES_LOW` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>, and `DMRES_DRAFT` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>.
For more information about the `DEVMODE` structure, see the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

Docs.summary: Gets the vertical printer resolution, in dots per inch.
Docs.value: The vertical printer resolution, in dots per inch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind>, the default value of the Y property is -1.
